review.title: “For those with interest in the banking domain and who do not mind Slow Growth.”
review.pros: Pros – 1.A young vibrant and enthusiastic team.2.An opportunity to learn the Banking Process of some International banks.3.Above average work atmosphere, infrastructure coupled with ambience.
review.cons: Cons – Very little respect. Don't expect appreciation - even if it does come it is not a salary hike or a promotion but some peanuts.What's even worse ? You get burdened with somebody else's job and get sworn at if not completed within the unrealistic timeframe set for its completion.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – 1.Please clearly define the roles that each of your employees have to play.2.When you spot a talent please nurture it. It does as much good to you as the person itself.3.Set realistic deadlines & achievable targets.
